metadata.title: itFolks Tech | Software Development Consultancy
metadata.description: We transform ideas into high-quality code. Specialized in web development, mobile apps, and Python backend solutions.

hero.title: We Transform Ideas
hero.description: A technology consultancy focused on agile and modern development. We combine technical expertise with a human approach to deliver solutions that make a difference.

services.title: Our Expertise
services.description: We offer specialized solutions to accelerate your digital transformation

web.title: Web Development
web.description: Modern, responsive applications built with React, Vue.js, and Next.js. Pixel-perfect interfaces with exceptional user experience.

mobile.title: Mobile Apps
mobile.description: Native and cross-platform applications with Flutter and React Native. Seamless experiences on iOS and Android.

backend.title: Python Backend
backend.description: Robust and scalable APIs with Python. Data automation, integrations, and high-performance processing systems.

payments.title: Payment Integrations
payments.description: Secure implementation of Stripe and other payment gateways. Subscriptions, marketplaces, and complete checkout flows.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.description: Passionate professionals who turn complex challenges into elegant solutions

raul.name: Raul
raul.bio: Leading frontend architecture and mobile development with a focus on user experience and code quality.

leo.name: Leo
leo.bio: Building modern web applications and mobile experiences with Next.js, React, and React Native.

higor.name: Higor
higor.bio: Expert in building robust APIs with Node.js, Strapi CMS, and Python backend solutions.

pythonSquad.name: Python Squad
pythonSquad.bio: A dedicated team focused on data engineering, process automation, and Python-based solutions.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: A selection of our recent work showcasing our expertise

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Platform
ecommerce.description: Full-stack e-commerce solution with Stripe integration, real-time inventory, and admin dashboard.

dashboard.title: Analytics Dashboard
dashboard.description: Real-time analytics platform with interactive charts, data visualization, and automated reports.

mobile.title: Fitness App
mobile.description: Cross-platform mobile app with workout tracking, social features, and health integrations.

techStack.title: Technologies We Master
techStack.description: We use the best tools in the market to deliver cutting-edge solutions

footer.description: Technology consultancy focused on agile and modern development.
